tech_news.title: Here's How Much A 2021 Chevy Corvette Has Depreciated In Just 5 Years - Jalopnik
tech_news.description: The Chevrolet Corvette hasn't depreciated much over the last five years, losing around a quarter of its value in that time.

tech_news.description: The developer of the upcoming Action RPG Nightin Cage has responded quickly to fan feedback regarding fanservice and the character's animations.

tech_news.title: ‘Halo’ Actor Steve Downes Asks You Not to Remake His Voice with AI - Gizmodo

tech_news.title: LACT 0.8.4 Brings Improved Overclocking UI For GPUs On Linux - Phoronix
tech_news.description: In the absence of any official GUI control panel from AMD or Intel for their graphics cards on Linux, LACT remains a popular choice particularly for AMD Radeon Linux gamers/enthusiasts to manage various aspects of their GPU from a convenient UI

tech_news.title: RuneScape gold counts as real stolen property after UK judge rules in $700K theft case - Dexerto
tech_news.description: A UK judge has ruled that RuneScape gold can count as stolen property after an ex-developer was accused of stealing $700,000.

tech_news.title: Windows 11 update may stop some PCs from booting, warns Microsoft - Windows Central
tech_news.description: Microsoft has posted an online bulletin confirming that the company is investigating reports that state Windows 11's latest security update has rendered some PCs unbootable.
